title: WTB T213-2 Coupon need 11 to finish the set

posts.post_title: WTB T213-2 Coupon need 11 to finish the set
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Andy Cook
I will buy or trade aggressively for any of these T213-2s. My only condition requirement is the caption must be readable. This board has helped me make many hits to this set, please help me finish it off! Thanks, Andy typecard@aol.com
